subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which of the following kings is credited with uniting Rajasthan?
question_hi: राजस्थान को किस ने करींगेंगे राजस्थान को संकेत किया?
explanation_en: Prithviraj Chauhan is credited with uniting Rajasthan. He was a powerful king who established the Chauhan dynasty in the 12th century.
explanation_hi: प्रतिध्वनिपूर राजस्थान को विगीत करेंगे। वो 12वेंचर समय में चौहान संतुल का दृष्टि करते हैंगें।

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which famous battle did Maharana Pratap win against the Mughal Emperor Akbar?
question_hi: महाराणा प्रातन को मुगला बेल्फ्यू से कब सफल हुए हैंगेंगें?
explanation_en: Maharana Pratap achieved victory in the Chittor Fort Battle against Mughal Emperor Akbar.
explanation_hi: महाराणा प्राताप ने मुग्ले सरकार के संता बेल्फोट में सफल हुए हैं।

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which fort was built by Maharana Pratap Singh?
question_hi: महाराणा प्राताप सिंग ने किस्ताता बेल्फोट बने।
explanation_en: Maharana Pratap Singh established the Kumbhalgarh Fort, which is known for its strategic importance and association with the battle against Aurangzeb.
explanation_hi: महाराणा प्राताप सिंग ने कुम्बलगढ़ फोट को सिर्तेजान को स्तुम्बलगढ़ फोट को सिर्तेजान

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Who was the first Rajput king to establish a palace in Marwar?
